# Auth Guide

## Overview

Legacy module for authentication.

## Structure

- `auth.service.ts`: JWT logic, refresh tokens.
- `auth.controller.ts`: Login/logout endpoints.
- `auth.module.ts`: NestJS module.

## Patterns

- JWT with roles.
- @Public() and @Roles() decorators.</content>
